replies.msg:
有冇識C programming嘅巴打可以睇下有咩問題
呢個program係計trapezium嘅area
個area出極都係0 cm2

#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
float b1, b2, area, h;
printf("Enter length1<cm>, length2<cm>, and height<cm> of the trapezoid: ");
scanf("%f", &b1, &b2, &h);
printf("The area of the trapezoid is %d cm2\n", area);
return 0;
}

replies.msg:
我而家嘅code係咁樣
#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
float b1, b2, area, h;
printf("Enter length1<cm>, length2<cm>, and height<cm> of the trapezoid: ");
scanf("%f %f %f", &b1, &b2, &h);
area = (1/2) * (b1 + b2) * h;
printf("The area of the trapezoid is %f cm2\n", area);
return 0;
}
